specialTraits.name: Amphibious
specialTraits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The dragon exhales acid in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

savingThrow.effect: 22 (5d8) acid damage, or half on success

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

savingThrow.effect: 56 (16d6) fire damage, or half on success
